long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Amazon Review Downloader offers effortless Product Review Extraction!

Are you tired of the tedious process of copying and pasting product reviews from Amazon? Say goodbye to hours of painstaking work â€“ with Amazon Review Downloader, you can download all the reviews you need in a flash, neatly organised in a csv file.

âœ¨ What Makes Amazon Review Downloader Stand Out:

- Works Seamlessly Across ALL Amazon Marketplaces Worldwide! Access reviews from any Amazon platform with ease.
- No More Manual Review Management: Say farewell to the days of manually sorting and organising reviews.
- Export reviews for many products simultaneously
- Save your reviews for later if you ever need to download them again

Download Includes:
Review ID
Rating
Reviewer's name
Reviewer's profile link
Product variation
Date
Title
Body
Verified purchase status
Review image link(s)
ðŸš€ How to Use Amazon Review Downloader in 4 Easy Steps:


Step 1: Visit any Amazon.com product page.
Step 2: Simply click on the Amazon Review Downloader extension icon. Watch as all reviews are effortlessly downloaded into a convenient .csv file.
Step 4: Open the .csv file in Google Sheets or Excel, and start exploring the reviews. You can sort, highlight, download the file as an Excel sheet, or perform any necessary actions swiftly and efficiently.
